content.rendered:
REGISTRATIONS TO THE CONFERENCE ARE NOW CLOSED.
THANK YOU ALL FOR YOUR OVERWHELMING RESPONSE.

Registrations for the FOSS4G Asia 2021 are now closed…

Considering the prevailing uncertainties due to the COVID 19 pandemic, it has been decided to hold all the technical presentations in an online mode.  The schedule will be announced shortly.

The Conference Registration Fee includes:

  • Regular Registration includes Conference Ticket
  • Special Registration includes Conference Ticket+ Two Workshop Tickets
  • Certificate of Paper Presentation/ Attendance
  • Conference Kit for Institutional Participants

The schedule of registration fees for the conference is indicated below.:
